thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Euston Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: London weekend
thread.title_full: London weekend - Review of Premier Inn London Euston Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Sue B
title: London weekend
text: This hotel is in a great location - within a few minutes of Euston station it makes trips to museums and attractions quick and easy. Despite being in a central location the rooms are very quiet and temperature controls are very effective. The rooms are equipped with TV, tea/coffee making facilities, phone, soap / bodywash, free wifi is an added bonus. On site cafe serves a good value continental or full English breakfast and staff are really polite and friendly.
